sentence.Network_en: Pragmatically, MTV's survival depends on selling the youth market to advertisers.
sentence.Network_cn: 从务实角度来说，音乐电视网的生存依赖于把年轻人市场卖给广告商。

sentence.Network_en: We want to build a democratic society, but we must act pragmatically.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们想建立一个民主主义社会, 但是我们必须从实际出发.

sentence.Network_en: Restricted interrogative sentences are pragmatically presented as various untrue interrogative sentences.
sentence.Network_cn: 受限制疑问句在语用上表现为各种非真性问句.

entry.tran: 讲求实效的；实用的；务实的
entry.def: A pragmatic way of dealing with something is based on practical considerations, rather than theoretical ones. A pragmatic person deals with things in a practical way.

example.ex: Robin took a pragmatic look at her situation.
example.tran: 罗宾实际地考虑了一下她的处境。

example.ex: ...a pragmatic approach to the problems faced by Latin America.
example.tran: 针对拉美面临问题的切实的解决办法

sentences.sentence: "we want to build a democratic society, but we must act pragmatically"

auth_sentence.content: Morally and pragmatically, it was way past the time to surrender.
auth_sentence.res_content: Morally and pragmatically, it was way past the time to surrender.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Morally and pragmatically, it was way past the time to surrender.

auth_sentence.content: Which means, he adds, you should go ahead pragmatically with the next steps.
auth_sentence.res_content: Which means, he adds, you should go ahead pragmatically with the next steps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Which means, he adds, you should go ahead pragmatically with the next steps.

auth_sentence.content: But somehow we came together to pragmatically do some work to help our brothers and sisters face their reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: But somehow we came together to pragmatically do some work to help our brothers and sisters face their reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But somehow we came together to pragmatically do some work to help our brothers and sisters face their reality.
